tool_description: Sends concise SMS reminders to participants with survey links, character optimization, and delivery confirmation tracking.

phone_numbers.description: Array of recipient phone numbers with country codes

survey_link.description: Survey URL to include in SMS

error_messages: Invalid phone_numbers: Phone numbers must include country code and be 10-15 digits.
Invalid survey_link: Survey link must be a valid URL.
Message too long: SMS message exceeds 160 characters after including survey link.
Unsupported template: Supported templates are [standard, brief, urgent, final].
SMS service unavailable: SMS delivery service is currently unavailable.
Phone number limit exceeded: Maximum 500 phone numbers per batch.
usage: Provide phone_numbers and survey_link. Optionally select message_template for different reminder tones. Returns delivery status and message details.

messages_sent.description: Number of SMS messages successfully sent

message_length.description: Length of the SMS message in characters

delivery_timestamp.description: When the SMS batch was sent
